messages.content: At our office, in Financial distinct.
We could schedule sometime this week.

We have had a look at your platform and see some possible synergies.

We can have a meeting between your founders and our founders this week, if that works for you.
We havenât tried your platform yet but will have a look.
We understand but as mentioned, we are only referring to govt sites at this point for sensitive info such as this.

But on a different note, just wanted to find out-

Are you someone who is interested in land? (Buying/selling). And if yes, did you find us useful? Or did you use our platform anytime?

Sure. 

But why exactly is that? 

We digitized the lakes from the HMDA official website data, Into a more usable format for people to use, and made that free for everyone.

We feel we could ask you to help!

Hi there,

At this point we are yet to point our audience to any private platform for such information. If anything we are referring to govt sites.

Hello from 1acre.in ð, 

In context to recent demolitions by HYDRAA, We,at 1acre.in, are digitising HMDA lakes with their FTL and buffer zones so people can understand if their lands falls in these zones instantly. 

Link : www.1acre.in/lakes

We believe it helps a lot of people who are currently in distress. See if you can help spread the word about this :) 

Thanks,
Team 1acre (edited)

We are digitising HMDA lakes with their FTL and buffer zones so people can understand if their lands falls in these zones instantly.

We believe it helps a lot of people who are currently in distress. See if you can help spread the word about this :)

Team 1acre
